titleInfo.title: Flatt and Scruggs Show at Sandy Ridge High School

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on white) announcing, direct from the Grand Ole Opry, the Flatt and Scruggs Show at the Sandy Ridge High School on March 7. Poster features a metal photoplate of Lester Flatt and Earl Scruggs. This poster is a reprint of the original poster from 1969. It was also reprinted in 2013. Posters printed after the original edition are known as "restrikes."

subject.topic: Flatt and Scruggs and the Foggy Mountain Boys (Musical group)

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
